member.name: T:Syncfusion.XForms.PopupLayout.AnimationMode
member.summary: Built-in animations available in SfPopupLayout, which is applied when the PopupView opens and closes in the screen.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.PopupLayout.AnimationMode.Zoom
member.summary: zoom-out animation will be applied when the PopupView opens and zoom-in animation will be applied when the PopupView closes

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.PopupLayout.AnimationMode.Fade
member.summary: Fade-out animation will be applied when the PopupView opens and Fade-in animation will be applied when the PopupView closes

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.PopupLayout.AnimationMode.SlideOnLeft
member.summary: PopupView will be animated from left-to-right, when it opens and it will be animated from right-to-left when the PopupView closes.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.PopupLayout.AnimationMode.SlideOnTop
member.summary: PopupView will be animated from top-to-bottom, when it opens and it will be animated from bottom-to-top when the PopupView closes.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.PopupLayout.AnimationMode.None
member.summary: Animation will not be applied.

member.summary: Dismisses the pop-up from the view.
member.param: The native object of SfPopupLayout.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.XForms.PopupLayout.SfPopupLayout.Dispose
member.summary: Perform final clean up before it is released from memory.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.XForms.PopupLayout.SfPopupLayout.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the component and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: if true - release both managed and unmanaged resources; if false - release only unmanaged resources.
